definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
Animal Farm (1945), novel and famous satire on communist revolution by George Orwell 喬治·奧威爾|乔治·奥威尔[Qiao2 zhi4 · Ao4 wei1 er3]

sentences.english: Farmers are revolting over a new sliding-scale increase in export taxes.
sentences.chinese: 農場主對新出臺的出口稅率浮動上調政策非常不滿。

sentences.english: Although the farm is large, my Dad has two men working for him.
sentences.chinese: 儘管農場較大，我爸爸只僱了兩個人幫他幹活。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。
我們在農村，一個農場裏。

sentences.english: Clearly this was a profitable happenstance for both the owners and the king.
sentences.chinese: 顯然後者對於農場主和國王來說都是收益頗豐的驚喜。

sentences.english: The roosters on the farm say, "Cock-a-doodle-doo. ""
sentences.chinese: 農場裏的公雞說，“咯咯噠。”

sentences.english: They set aside 50 mu for an experimental farm.
sentences.chinese: 他們撥出50畝地作實驗農場。

sentences.english: He works on a state farm.
Kentucky farms produce some of the world's finest pure breed horses.
sentences.chinese: 肯塔基州農場出產一些世界上最好的純種馬。

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水體的農場灌溉是人們最大的淡水單一使用。

sentences.english: Morning Star Farms makes vegetarian buffalo wings, BBQ ribs, and meatless meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 晨星農場提供水牛城素辣雞翅，烤素肋骨，和素肉圓。

sentences.english: They STILL have defacto SLAVE LABOR, in their factories, and on farms.
sentences.chinese: 在工廠和農場裏，他們仍保留有事實上的奴工。

sentences.english: To support the children, Granny gets up early every day to work on her farm.
sentences.chinese: 爲了扶養孫兒，阿嬤每天一大早起牀到農場工作。

sentences.english: The state farms were semi-military in character.
sentences.chinese: 那些國有農場從性質上講是半軍事的。

sentences.english: Culture house of a model collective farm.
I grew up on a farm, helping my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我在農場長大，幫我父母親分擔農務。

definition: site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
